item.title: Let's Have an Honest Conversation About Recruiters
item.description: The What I lied, this isn’t a goddamned conversation, there’s no commenting on this blog. You’re going to listen to why the title recruiter is another way of saying “demon from the really lame Dante’s Inferno level, where you waste time for all eternity”. There are exceptions of course, see the section entitled The Why I have been hurt by recruiters, but that’s not what makes them such a wonderful target.
